thread.section_title: Parkway Cars Perton Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Parkway Cars Perton | parkwaycarsperton.co.uk
thread.title: Hannahh Louise Davies
thread.title_full: Parkway Cars Perton reviewed by Hannahh Louise Davies

author: Hannahh Louise Davies
title: Hannahh Louise Davies
text: Parkway cars is a friendly company and is a reliable taxi service for Perton and surrounding areas. The prices are very competitive and the driver (Matthew) is a lovely guy. I highly recommend his services and can guarantee you will not be disappointed.
